description:
proxy: move from exp/proxy

This change copies exp/proxy to go.net without any code changes. A
followup CL will remove exp/proxy.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d7d24fafd03c&repo=net ***

proxy: move from exp/proxy

This change copies exp/proxy to go.net without any code changes. A
followup CL will remove exp/proxy.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6449097

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://agl%40golang.org@code.google.com/p/go.net/

(I was traveling over the weekend and I'm at USENIX this week, but I still have email access etc.)

http://codereview.appspot.com/6449097/diff/2001/proxy/per_host.go
File proxy/per_host.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6449097/diff/2001/proxy/per_host.go#newcode115
proxy/per_host.go:115: // AddIP specifies an IP range that will use the bypass proxy. Note that this
Note: this comment is wrong, but I'd like this CL to be a simple move with changes coming in later CLs.

subject: code review 6449097: proxy: move from exp/proxy
